title: Digital advertising revenue of leading online companies 2012 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Platforms for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Platform Google, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL 13481.0 among the 8 groups and in AOL, 2015 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Platform Google, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Platforms and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Platform AOL.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Platform Google was 9558.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Platform AOL.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Platforms on X-axis for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Platform Google had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 8 groups, and it was for 2019. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Platform AOL for 2015.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Platforms for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Platform Google, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL 13481.0 among the 8 groups and in AOL, 2015 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
In Platform Google, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Platforms and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Platform AOL.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Platform Google was 9558.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Platform AOL.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Platforms for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 8 groups, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL in Platform Google and 2015 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Platform AOL.
In Platform Google, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Platforms and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Platform AOL.
There is a gap of 9557.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017 in Platform Google and AOL.
Out of all 8 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2018.
2019 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 8 groups in Platform Google followed by 2019 in Google, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2015 in AOL.
Averaging all 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Platform Google is the maximum SOME LABEL and AOL is the minimum SOME LABEL.
